thread.section_title: Mr. Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mr. Supply | mrsupply.com
thread.title: Eric W
thread.title_full: Mr. Supply reviewed by Eric W

author: Eric W
title: Eric W
text:
I searched several websites for the best price in Lutron switches. By far, MrSupply blew every other vendor away with price and availability. Then, to top it off, they offered a discount for my large order and sales tax.
The product arrived sooner than expected in perfect condition. I will buy from MrSupply again!
